mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( wac.bank_name, "储蓄卡(", RIGHT (wac.bank_card_no, 4), ")" ) FROM wj_trade_account_card wac WHERE wac.card_type = 'security' AND wac.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT '借款金额' AS borrowAmountLabel, IFNULL(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('wage_advance_add_amount','wage_advance'),'100') AS borrowAmountAdd, IFNULL(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('wage_advance_min_amount','wage_advance'),'500.00') AS borrowAmountMin, IFNULL(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('wage_advance_max_amount','wage_advance'),'') AS borrowAmountMax, CONCAT (IFNULL(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('wage_advance_min_amount','wage_advance'),'500') ,'～',IFNULL(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('wage_advance_max_amount','wage_advance'),'2000')/10000 ,'万') AS borrowAmountInputTip, CONCAT ('<font color=#B8CDD6>需为</font><font color=#FFC73D>' ,IFNULL(QUERY_PARAM_VALUE('wage_advance_add_amount','wage_advance') ,'100') ,'整数</font><font color=#B8CDD6>倍</font>') AS borrowAmountDesc FROM DUAL
